comments:
Product version: smoke test for integration build 20011127

I did the following:

- JDT smoke test section Java Resource Compare
- did the copy of the util folder in the resource navigator
- renamed the folder using the inplace rename functionality
- selected both folders
- did a comapre with each other (as described in smoke test)
- expanded folder util2
